name: Brick

topics.response_text: Did ya see me? Nothing good ole' Eugene and a few hundred rounds of ammo couldn't handle.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, Brick... You really, um, ventilated them...
topics.response_text: You bet your ass I did! Did you see that Super Mutant's head burst? Beautiful!

topics.topic_text: Has anyone ever spoken to you about anger management?
topics.response_text: Well, someone did once, and I swear I let them leave only with a slight limp.
Last guy who said something like that to me took a long dirt nap. Catch my drift?

topics.topic_text: What's been happening since you've been back?
topics.response_text: Now that you're part of the team, Reilly is her old self again.

topics.topic_text: Where can I get some more ammo around here?
topics.response_text: Well, if you've picked the Mutie corpses clean, there isn't much else to scrounge.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Vernon Square?
topics.response_text: The other guys hate mappin' this zone, but hey, I love it. I love turning the 'muties into a fine, red mist with my gun.

topics.topic_text: I have a Fission Battery that will fix that express elevator.
topics.response_text: Well, what the fuck you bringin' it to me for? Get it plugged into the elevator!

topics.topic_text: Here, I brought you some ammo.
How have you guys survived up here?
topics.response_text: Skill baby, pure skill. And my big-ass gun!

topics.topic_text: Any clue where I can find a Fission Battery?
topics.response_text: All I remember is mowing down Super Mutants with Eugene here.

conversation.response_text: Hey, all right! Me 'n Eugene are glad to see ya!

description:
Brick is a 32 year-old Hispanic Female.

A muscular Hispanic woman with a distinctive scar running across her left cheek, Brick is a formidable heavy weapons specialist for Reilly's Rangers. Standing tall with a commanding presence, she is rarely seen without at least one of her beloved miniguns, affectionately named Eugene.

Brick's Personality: Brick has a straightforward and somewhat crude personality, preferring action over contemplation. She gets along well with her fellow Rangers but views them as 'eggheads' who excel in sciences but lack combat prowess. Despite her brutal efficiency in battle, Brick possesses a strange sense of humor and a good heart, as evidenced by her Good Karma. She has an unusual attachment to her weapons, referring to multiple miniguns as 'Eugenes' and attributing them with personalities. Whether she genuinely suffers from a personality disorder or simply revels in the gore of combat is unclear, as she often jokes about her supposed insanity.

Brick's Backstory: Born in the year 2245, Brick grew up in the harsh environment of the Capital Wasteland. From a young age, she showed a natural talent for handling heavy weaponry, often practicing with whatever scrap metal and makeshift guns she could find. Her life took a turn when she encountered Reilly's Rangers, impressed by their organization and purpose. Recognizing her unique skills, Reilly offered her a place in the Rangers, where she quickly established herself as their go-to heavy weapons specialist. Brick's relationship with her miniguns is peculiar, treating them almost like companions and giving them all the name 'Eugene.' This behavior has led some to question her mental state, but her effectiveness in combat and her underlying loyalty to the Rangers have earned her a respected place within the group.
